Meet Your Tutor

Get to know Mahder Negash Mamo and his approach to teaching Amharic.

MM
Mahder Negash Mamo
Professional Amharic Tutor for Learners Worldwide

About Me

Experienced Amharic teacher who makes language learning fun, simple, and interactive. Join me for easy lessons packed with culture and conversation!

Teaching Style

My teaching style is patient, interactive, and tailored to each student's pace and goals. I use a mix of conversational practice, structured exercises, and cultural insights to make learning both effective and enjoyable.

Services Offered

  • 1-on-1 Personalized Lessons
  • Group Conversation Classes
  • Beginner to Advanced Levels
  • Accent & Pronunciation Coaching
